content: delicate pocket shawl kathryn kurylo materials used i love this cotton yarn by hobby lobby 4wt 6 5mm crochet hook & 10mm for tassels tapestry needle and scissors chain 265 to achieve about 60 inches in length row 1 half_double_crochet 264 along chain 1sc and turn for next row row 2 half_double_crochet in back loop only of previous row =264 stitches 1 chain and turn for next row row 3 - 6 repeat half_double_crochet in back loop only for 4 more row and end each row with 1chain and turn row 7 chain 2 and double_crochet in same stitch creating 2 stitches to start the row skip 2 stitches and 3dc in the 3rd stitch repeat skipping 2 stitches and 3dc in 3rd stitch through the remainder of the row creating 87 bunches of 3dc end the row with one double_crochet at the last stitch chain 2 and turn row 8 double_crochet in same stitch as the chain 2 decrease double_crochet into each of 3 double_crochet of previous row by wrap one loop around hook insert into 1st of 3 double_crochet of previous row wrap loop around hook and pull pull through 1st 2 loops keep remaining 2 loops on hook wrap another loop around hook insert into 2nd of the 3 double_crochet of previous row wrap loop around hook and pull through pull through 2 loops keeping 3 loops on hook wrap loop around hook and insert into 3rd of 3 double_crochet of previous row wrap loop around hook and pull pull through 2 loops on hook finally pull through all 4 remaining loops on hook and chain 1 repeat this 87 times for 87 bunches end row with 1 double_crochet and chain 2 turn row 9 double_crochet in same stitch as the chain 2 3dc into larger loop that was created by the previous row s pull through 4 loops action repeat this to create 87 bunches of 3dc in this row end last stitch with 1dc chain 2 and turn repeat row 8 and 9 10 more times each to create a total of 23 row row 7 through 29 row 30 chain 1 instead of chain 2 from previous row start with only a chain 1 half_double_crochet across all double_crochet of previous row = 264 stitches row 31 - 36 repeat row 30 half_double_crochet in back loop only of previous half_double_crochet stitches chain 1 and turn row 37 slip_stitch into each of the half_double_crochet stitches of previous row to give same framework of beginning of project pockets create 2 identical pockets with the following stitches chain 31 row 1 half_double_crochet into each chain = 30 stitches chain 1 and turn row 2 - 16 half_double_crochet into back loop only if previous row chain 1 and turn row 17 chain 1 additional stitch to create a chain 2 1dc into the same stitch creating 2 stitches to start the row skip 2 stitches and 3dc in the 3rd stitch repeat skipping 2 stitches and 3dc in 3rd
